Required Training

22 Mar 2019 by sammons

####Required Training for all Lab Members

Online training

  • Go to CITI and register using your UAlbany credientials.
  • Take the “Introduction to Biosafety” course
  • Take the “Training for Investigators, Staff, and Students Handling Biohazards” course.
  • Take the “Shipping and Transport of Regulated Biological Materials” course.
  • Take the “Managing Conflicts of Interest in Research” course.
  • Take the “Responsible Conduct of Research”

When complete, print or save the certificate and send to Morgan.

In-person training

The University at Albany Department of Environmental Health and Safety has in-person training every few months for biohazard and general lab safety. You are required to take this!!!

For more information, please see the EHS website
